title: Hey y’all, what’s the process to form /create a technical club?

comments.body:
Make a proposal document with what the club aims to achieve, how it will be good for both the students and the college as a whole. Make sure you have a budget slide.

Take it to your HOD as a proposal.
Any idea what is the accepted budget range?
Depends on the club and aimed activities
Are first year students allowed to form clubs?
Any idea what’s the ideal budget for tech clubs?

It's on a request basis

So you need to justify the money you are asking for

They can

But i suggest to wait for sometime
Understand club culture

And then form your own club

If you're looking at software stuff, then your budget shouldn't be too high. You may be able to leverage a lot of existing infrastructure at the campus.

If you're looking at hardware like cars/drones/planes, you would need about 20L+ with the current inflationary trends.

But without more details on the technical club we can't really help you.
